verses.1: Mi genthei a khualte thupha ngah ahi hi. Topa in haksatna hunah amaute hon khia ding hi.
verses.2: Topa in amaute hu-in hingsak dinga, leitungah amaute thupha ngah mi kici ding hi. Amauʼ galteʼ khut sungah amaute pia lo ding hi.
verses.3: A ci uh a nat ciangin Topa in amaute kem dinga, a cinatna khempeuh uh damsakkik ding hi.
verses.4: Keʼn ahihleh, “ Topa aw, kei hong hehpih inla, kei hong damsak in; bang hang hiam cih leh nang tungah kong khial zo hi,” ka ci hi.
verses.5: Ka galte in elna tawh keima thu gen uh a, “Cik ciangin amah a si tam, cik ciangin a min a mang tam,” ci uh hi.
verses.6: Keimah a en dingin mi hong pai ciangin, kam mawkna a pau uh hi. A lungsim uh ah siatna kaikhawm uh a, a paikhiat uh ciangin a genthang uh hi.
verses.7: Kei hong mudah khempeuh in keima thu kihuauhuau uh a, kei adingin a sia thei pen ding a geelgeel uh hi.
verses.8: Amaute in, “Amah nak gim mahmah hi. A lupna panin thokik zo nawn lo ding hi,” ci uh hi.
verses.9: Ka muan, ka lawm it pa, keima an a ne pa nangawn in a khetul tawh kei hong peek vial hi.
verses.10: Ahih hangin, Topa aw, amaute na thuhkik theih nadingin kei hong hehpih inla, hong damsak in.
verses.11: Ka galte in keimah hong zo lo dinga, keima tungah nong lungkimna ka thei ding hi.
verses.12: Keima hoihna hangin na hong huh dinga, nangma omna ah nong omsak tawntung ding hi.
verses.13: Israel Pasian, Topa in khang tawntungin thupha ngah tahen. Amen, Amen!
